title: Usage of Wiki
content:
Usage of Wiki #  This page tells how to edit this wiki.
 Get started Write your first article  1. Get Started #  Install Git #  If you haven’t installed Git yet, look here
Install Hugo #  This webpage is generated by Hugo.
To install Hugo, you copy below and paste it to install on your machine,
 MacOS Windows  and hugo-extended is also required. install hugo-extended through above software.
2. Write Your First Article #  Clone Repository #  Copy below and paste to your command line,
git clone -- recursive https://github.com/flat35hd99-test/flat35hd99-test.github.io.git {file name as you like} cd {file name} Create New Page #  Open the folder you just cloned and see the repository.
You can write new page on content/docs/{category as you like}.
Then create new file in the category you chose.
When you name a new file, use _ instead of white space and .md as extension.
Write A Page #  Now you can write articles AS YOU LIKE!!!!!!
If you aren’t familiar with markdown, please look this page.
Commit and Push #

title: CURP Usage
content:

This is bold text

Blockquotes #   Blockquotes can also be nested…
 …by using additional greater-than signs right next to each other…

   Lists #  Unordered

  Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet
  Consectetur adipiscing elit
  Integer molestie lorem at massa
  You can use sequential numbers…
  …or keep all the numbers as 1.
  Start numbering with offset:
foo bar  Code #  Inline code
Indented code

Sample text here... Syntax highlighting
var foo = function (bar) { return bar++; }; console.log(foo(5)); Tables #     Option Description     data path to data files to supply the data that will be passed into templates.   engine engine to be used for processing templates. Handlebars is the default.   ext extension to be used for dest files.    Right aligned columns

Term 2 ~ Definition 2a ~ Definition 2b

title: 日本語
content:
こんにちは。
このページは日本語の表示テストです。
タイトルに日本語使えないみたいです。残念。
ちなみにkatexという仕組みでtex記法で数式を埋込むことができます。こんな感じに
  \(f(x) = \int_{-\infty}^\infty\hat f(\xi)\,e^{2 \pi i \xi x}\,d\xi\)

title: Policy
content:
Policy #  All Yamato-group members feel free to write articles.
Be active to use this website and it will be helpful to straighten your thinking.
All members can read your articles. When you write them on this wiki, you need to do as somewhat easy to understand.

title: Tips
content:
TIPS #  This page shows how to edit this wiki.
 How to speak good English  hoge hogehoge   tyjrtbgvg
